Hallo!

Thanks for the great misson pack!!

I need help.

I like to play only the Gemini Mission pack, so I deleted all others in the mission folder. It did not offer me a contract from the gemini misson because I did not finish Gemini I. Gemini I is not available.

How do I install only a part of the misson pack?

Sorry if this is an epic n00b question, but I read the original post and searched this topic page for "vostok" and haven't found an answer:  

I've just unlocked the "korabl-sputnik 1" mission and it prompts me to use "an unmanned vostok-style command pod". I've tried using the stayputnik and prodobodyne octo probe cores; the contract says "[checkmark] crew: unmanned" but "[x-mark] Include an unmanned Vostok-style command pod".  

What am I missing here? I know there are several recommended parts mods, but it doesn't sound like they're required. I'm playing with several dozen mods, and it's possible that I've deleted a parts mod that was enabled when I started this career mode, but I haven't changed my modlist very much.  

Thanks very much for you answer, and for this amazingly comprehensive contract pack. Greatly enjoying the play-through.

Not sure if this has been reported before or not but I've noticed a small bug.  I'm playing KSP 1.2.2 with <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/<abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/RP-0 and all their required mods (plus FASA and a few other parts mods).  I'm in the Apollo era and am just finishing the Apollo 8 contract, though I had the same exact problem with the Apollo 4 contract.  If you use the FASA Apollo parts, the docking probe on the Apollo CSM attaches to the "Apollo Command Module Forward Heat Shield" which is jettisoned prior to splashdown so that the parachutes are exposed.  The problem is all the Apollo contracts have a requirement of having a docking port.  As soon as you jettison that forward heat shield, you lose the docking port which means you're missing one requirement to complete the contract.  This can be fixed by adding "disableOnStateChange = true" to the DockingPort portion of each Apollo contract.

On a side note, this is the first time I've ever played with the historical missions contract pack and I have to say I've really enjoyed it.  But I'd definitely like to see some additional Mercury, Gemini and Soyuz missions added to the pack.
Is this mode dead?

I'm finding a few missions that just don't seem to want to show up for me.  For instance, I've got the Mariner 10 and Viking 2 missions currently underway, I've completed all the Apollo missions (including the ASTP), and I've completed the first four Space Shuttle Missions.  But I've yet to be offered missions line Pioneer 10 & 11 or Voyager 1 & 2.  As far as I can tell, I meet the requirements for these missions, but they don't come up as options.  Anyone have any ideas?

Hi guys. I have been working on a replacement version for this mod for the <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> series for several months. It started as an expansion pack for this mod but became a full re-write after Whitecat quit modding. It aims to completely re-write and majorly expand this entire mod from beginning to end. First for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> and then for stock. The beta of 622 contracts is available for testing over in this thread [\[Wip\] History of Spaceflight - Contract Pack for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/RP-0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/173683-wip-history-of-spaceflight-contract-pack-for-rorp-0/)
